# [Interview #1159: Shadows of Self-Brookline, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1159#4)

#### BeskarKomrk

How much of Nightblood's personality and effects come from the Command he was given?

#### Brandon Sanderson

A moderate amount.
